name: Salmon Run (itch) (Andrew Leclair)
description:
The life of a salmon is tough - especially when it only lasts 10 seconds! Swim upstream through a variety of hazards while laying eggs along the way to ensure the next generation can take your place and finish where you left off. 

Made for Ludum Dare Jam 51!

  • Programming - Daniel Leclair
  • Programming - Joe Flint
  • Music + Sound Design - Brian Kalb
  • Art - Andrew Leclair
